name: Nevin Hauser
text: By far the best bar in Foley, AL. They have live entertainment often, karaoke weekly, and poker matches which are also weekly I believe. The pool tables are kept in excellent condition and they even serve food on special occasions. There is simply no contest, Docs is the best.

name: Robert Brown
text: Great place. Not to big not small. Bartenders have quick wit and dont put up with any BS. Great environment.

name: Camren Wall
text: Amazing establishment and atmosphere,  owners are equally awesome and genuine.  Safe place,  fun times,  everyone is family and is very clean.  Bathrooms are immaculate.... I recommend Max's Bloody Mary or the Bushwacker w floater for sure!

name: Sherrell Roper
text: GIGI was an amazing bartender/ personality. Service and drinks were perfect. Will always go back when in town !!!

name: Daniel Crain
text: Had a great time here! Kind of off the beaten path. It may be the best kept secret in Foley!.. Everyone was nice! The place is clean and had lighthearted atmosphere! My bartender, Sarah, made some great drinks and drink recommendations and was very friendly, attentive, and professional.  Pool tables and music.Thanks so much! I'll be back.

name: Chris B Griffiths
text: Not to sure what was going on at this bar last night, but the group I went with went in while I was having a smoke & by puff two they were leaving with a look of dissapoint I haven't seen in a while. So, two stars for everything you could've done, but probably never would've. My peak inside was all I needed. One word..... Locals only.

resp.text:
I don't know what you were looking for. On Sunday night, we are generally a local hang out, but we are all about building our clientele. Without you telling us what you felt was missing, or uncomfortable for you, it is impossible for us to improve.
I think it was a little premature for you to judge Doc Holliday's by a "peek inside".
I hope you'll give us a second chance and discover just why so many locals call us home.

name: Terry Quinn
text: Had the best time , best holiday weekend ever. I'm making plans for a weekend get away to Doc Holidays again. I live in Alexandria, La it's so worth the trip . Great music , great people, best. Bartenders ! If you go ask to meet G G she's awesome ! Can't wait for my next weekend visit !

name: Sarah Greer
text: Fantastic atmosphere with very sociable customers and staff. The owners treat you like family. The bar itself is extreamly clean and relaxing. Perfect place to unwind after a long day or let loose for the weekend!

name: Julie Britt
text: Great staff, COLD beer, LIVE music. This is a clean win-win good time! The owners will meet and greet as well! We are going back next weekend!

name: John Spivey
text: Great service, prices were reasonable. I definitely recommend this establishment!

name: Angila Sarvold
text: This is my favorite bar to go to outside of the one I work out. The most amazing cocktails! The entire staff kicks ass!

name: Shaun V
text: Great bartenders, pool tables are kept. Good choice.

name: Jackqulyn Salser
text: Friendly staff. Good pool tables. Fun environment. Im going back. Dig it

name: Mary Nobles
text: It was my Birthday when my boyfriend and I went on a Tuesday night and it was awesome.  Locals mostly  . Not busy. Just enough people to keep it interesting and not to loud . Dj was awesome play our request all night long . Bartender was great her name is GIGI . Go out have some fun , but drink responsibly.  They aim to please . If you need anything , anything at all if they don't have it they will get it for you , I'm sure they will do that there . Even if thats to call you a cab or call someone who cares for you . So go out and check them out and tell Gigi Mary sent ya'. They have love bands to boot . They are wheel chair accessible . With there public restrooms .  It's time for Christmas to you guys they are having a dinner and dirty Santa on December 17, 2017 that starts at 6:00 pm . Then on New Year's day they have Journey 2 mars Sunday December 31st , 2017. So go out have some fun but get a cab it's so much cheaper that away . Be careful out there and bring in this new year with a bang and good memories to go with you when you get home. Hope to see ya'll there .

name: Billy Campbell
text: My wife and I love this place!! The music is always going and keeps people on the dance floor!! We especially love it when there is a band playing!! The owner, Jeff is friendly and personable. He makes rounds and tries to speak to people and make sure everyone is enjoying themselves. The bartenders are always fast, attentive, and super friendly!! There is a dress code but this a good thing. It does exactly what it was put in place for. The building itself is always clean along with the restrooms!! Always a good, fun, laid back crowd!! We frequent Tillys and it keeps getting better!!

name: zac coburn
text: The Jeff Bezos of Mobile, Al. If you come and don’t try a Jeff Bomb your missing the experience. Great service, better drinks, Tilly’s!

text: Dj played all requests and had a great time. Recommend to all looking for fun and dancing!!

text: From New Orleans and new to the Mobile area. Was looking for a fun night club to bring my wife out for her birthday and stumbled upon this place. Great atmosphere for couples who like to dance.

text: Great place, great atmospher, huge dance floor..... Bartender is awesome... If you haven't checked it out your missing outtttt!!!

text: We strongly disagree with the negative comments. THIS IS NOT A DIVE BAR.  It is a safe clean place for anyone to come and enjoy, especially ladies. The non-smoking atmosphere is a blessing.

text: OMG!  What a FABULOUS grand opening!!  It felt like we had come home, but even better.  Kudos to Jeff Campbell and his exemplary staff for a job very well done!!

text:
Turned down a group of 6 at 8:00 pm because we didn’t have collared shirts. Rather strange given the smokey atmosphere and lack of people there.
I’d give this establishment a months time before their out of business. 9 thumbs down. 👎

resp.text: The dress code is doing exactly what it was designed to do.  TillysDanceClub is non smoking. Clean fresh air for those that can conform to a dress code.

text: Have been there several times and had a great time!! They even let my wife bring in her own mix  since she’s not allowed to have sugar great job on the cleanliness and atmosphere!!

resp.text: Thanks James!  Always a pleasure to hear positive feedback.  We hope to see you again soon.

text: Was good to walk in this place. Dinner every Thursday. Chicken and dumplings home made buffet milk biscuits and Conecuh sausage. Was a good place back in the day under an old bar name but alot nicer and we got in on happy hour

resp.text:
Thank you for the compliments, Lisa!! Its always nice to hear from someone who remembers what "the old bar" was like and has something to compare "the new" to! We worked super hard to make it that gorgeous. 😚  Hope we see you again soon!
-Lauren

text: Came in from out of town with some business colleagues and right away a very pretty girl came up to me and we chatted for a bit and I decided to take her to the VIP room to see how it was being as I’m not from here. The young gal was very nice and danced lovely, I have no complaints there. My complaint is that several other dancers and hostesses or waitresses whatever have you were filming and taking photographs which I find very unprofessional. Flash photography and videography is prohibited in the clubs I have previously been to up state. I don’t think a lot of men go to clubs looking for their photos plastered on websites or whatever may come of them. I told the gal I didn’t appreciate cameras around and she assured me they were not taking photos of the customers. I felt like my privacy was invaded especially if you are paying good money for privacy in VIP and I sure hope this policy is updated. Again, my dancer was very kind and pretty, I very much enjoyed her company but I can’t see myself going back due to that reason.

name: Senior Mwiti
text:
I decided to visit Sammy's adult club to unwind after a long week. I noticed after my last visit in Dec. 2015, that the club had really changed and not in a good way. The first thing I noticed is how the club had hired very unfriendly and unprofessional staff. The bouncer a five foot bald black guy looked very creepy and weird, he looked like bouncers you would meet in ghetto clubs. My friends and some of relatives who USED to frequent the club kept saying that this particular bouncer was rude, unpolished, and should not be working in a high end club like Sammy's.

He pretends to be the management, but you can see that he has no customer service experience at all. This bouncer has some serious issues, that need to be addressed by management. There are a lot of complaints on social media about this particular bouncer and management seem to be hiding their heads in the sand.

I might also add that some of the girls are less than average. I found it very difficult tipping girls that I didn't think that should be allowed to strip dance on a public stage.

Sammy's used to be a classy and very customer friendly club in Birmingham, not anymore. A lot of my friends and relatives have recommended that I try "The Furnace club". I will not be going back to Sammy's any time soon, that's for sure. If you are spending your hard earned money you at least expect good customer service and a friendly environment. A bouncer is the first staff member you get to see and therefore, a creepy and rude one is very telling of the outlook of the club in general.

text:
Went there last night for the first time and had a bad experience. Security is beyond ridiculous. I got threatened with a taser because one security guard didn't like that I was sipping on my beer and trying to close my tab at 3:01. I know that makes no sense but that's what happened. The guys name is John I believe - 5 foot tall, bald headed, unethical black guy who eats too much protein and is easily intimidated. The "real" cop that was in there didn't help either. I have never been treated this poorly by any club in all the state's I travel to. This all happened even after spending over $100.

I paid for a beer that got snatched out of my hand and thrown onto the bartender while the guy was sparking the taser in the other hand. He then followed me outside, calling me names and playing with his taser while I was heading to my vehicle. Bartenders and servers were great and the girls were nice. Cigarettes said $5 but actually cost $8. A lap dance with clothes on is over priced in my opinion at $20 in a place like that. The atm charges you $7 to withdraw - you're better offer bringing cash with you.

Saw a manager at another bar afterward and he deeply apologized for the actions of the security guy. He agreed that the guy lost his temper far too easily and gave me a free pass for next time if I choose to go back. Not sure I'll be back. My luck would be that he have a gun next time and lose his cool and shoot me or someone else. Be very careful.

text:
The energy was not only very welcoming but, the vibe was very energetic and vibrant.

I was only in town for a short time and visited Roxy's on a Thursday and then again on a Friday.

Thursday was relaxed and chilled while Friday is the start of the partying for the weekend. It was full but not overwhelmingly crowded, you could still easily maneuver your way to the bar and the restrooms in the back and the staff was highly attentive.

Let me not forget to mention the amazing downtown location just minutes away from the beautiful UA Campus.

The owners are doing this very well and I hear they plan to expand and I am all here for it.

The RiverPub at Cliff’s Landing

name: Steve Stanley
text: Enjoyed the lunch special at Jockers today.  Excellent curries.  I love their Indian dishes so I haven't tried the American dishes. Service was fast and courteous.  The atmosphere is great for a business meeting or dining with friends.

resp.text: Great choice of having authentic Indian dishes. We are open for lunch from 11am to 2pm and dinner from 4pm until 9pm and Friday/Saturday 10pm. Sunday 12-5pm. We have two cuisines American and Indian. We provide courteous, friendly and fast service in a relaxing atmosphere with quality, fresh and value for money meals. The restaurant offers signature drinks and cocktails.We cater for all types of guests- business , family, reunion, meetings, casual and groups. Thank you for your business.

name: Cynthia Payne
text: It was delicious and fast. Not very many customers so waitress was very attentive and knowledgeable of the menu except that I ordered a salad and they were not taking orders for salads.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Pleased you enjoyed your meal in a great atmosphere with fast and friendly service. All our staff are trained to know our menu items and explain to our valuable guests. Salads are presently not available.

name: Jay O
text: The food was outstanding, the service was on point. It was refreshing to eat a quality meal. The staff is great...always checking on ya...owner was exceptional...visited and made sure food was delicious.  Very clean.

resp.text: Awesome. Thank you for your five star rating. We strive for excellence with every dish served and guest. We ensure that our dishes are prepared freshly per order. Your are absolutely right about our employees- friendly, polite, attentive, helpful with every guest. We appreciate your business.

name: Visaboy M.
text: I only experienced their Philly Fries and some type of desert. Philly Fries were amazing. Not very expensive.

resp.text: Appreciate your review. Loaded Philly Fries are our signature dish. Very popular with our valuable guests. We offer variety of deserts that our guests order after have a delicious meal. Thank you for visiting our restaurant.

name: Hunter Waldman
text: My wife, a friend, and I went to try the Indian Cuisine at Jokers for Lunch today. It was excellent. I love Indian food and am a tough critic, but it was the best Indian I’ve ever had. Rick came out and talked with us (great guy) and we’ve been begging the Shoals area to get an Indian restaurant. Super pumped about this place and hoping to get them more visitors. If you are unsure of what to order, you cannot go wrong with Chicken Tika Massala. It’s a very “safe” first time order. Excellent food overall.

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you for your feedback. It was absolutely pleasure serving your party. Definitely Chicken Tikka Masala is favorite Indian cuisine around the world. Our chef cooks each meal per order, therefore, fresh quality ingredients and appetizing. We will extend our menu as business grows giving our valuable guests more choices to ensure we can meet their palate. We appreciate your loyalty.

name: Rikesh Patel
text:
Love the upscale feel and atmosphere with a great twist.

Their cocktails are great and the lighting is really cool around the bar area.

It is nice to know that there are different cuisine options in the Shoals.

Great draft beer options and entertainment. This will be a regular spot from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your business. We offer Indian and American cuisine to suit every guests needs. We are pleased to do restaurant business in the Shoals area. Variety of cocktails, beer and music offered daily.

name: Sam Carpenter
text: Never been to a more funner place then this club. The bartender Jake gave me the best drinks and he was hilarious! He made my experience much more enjoyable we always take great care of him when we are there on saturdays. Every Saturday is a routine for me and the guys and this place has won me over

resp.text: We appreciate your loyalty to Jokers Bar and restaurant. We have variety of drinks and specialty cocktails. Jake is a wonderful bartender like rest of our team. He does create a great experience for our valuable guests. See you next Saturday. Thank you.

name: April De Luna
text: My husband and I went here to eat Indian food and that we did. We was so pleased with the waitress Bret is her name I believe. And the food was Awesome... We will absolutely be back time and time again. Thank you Chef Ram..

resp.text: Thank you for coming over to our Jokers restaurant. Absolutely our food is the finest in the area. Pleased you enjoyed your Indian dishes, which is very authentic. Your server Brett is very friendly, polite, helpful like rest of our valuable servers. We look forward to your next visit. We pass on your comments to Ram, chef.

name: Michelle Poston
text: We are from out of town visiting family, the butter chicken was good/ok. But, not much chicken, it was mostly sauce. Small portions of rice too.

resp.text: We appreciate you trying out our establishment for authentic Indian dishes. Our butter chicken is a very popular dish. Sorry you felt there was not enough chicken. We serve extra rice rice on request. We hope you visit us again and any concerns please let us know. Thank you for your business.

name: Beverly Emerson
text: Food Good and lots of space. Room outside and great dance

resp.text: Wonderful. Yes we have a great outdoor patio with a stage and 2 bars with plenty of seating facilities. Also there is enough space for people to enjoy the music and dance the night away! This all compliments our Indian/ American cuisine- great choices of freshly cooked dishes. Hope you enjoyed the band last night.

name: Melissa Littrell
text: First time at Jokers.  Food was great abd the music of Tremayne was awesome!  They need to be your house band!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Tremayne are an excellent band playing variety of popular songs. The crowd at Jokers had a great time listening and dancing to their music. As you mentioned we have awesome selection of food with American and Indian menu selections. We have live entertainment on Friday or Saturday check our Facebook page.

name: David Ellis
text: My wife and I love Indian cuisine, and this is excellent and authentic! We have had been searching for a place since the good one in Madison closed.

resp.text: Thank you for your visit to Jokers to eat our delicious Indian meal. We are glad to bring Indian cuisine to the Shoals. The menu consists variety of Indian delicacies. We appreciate your business.

name: Jake Miller
text: Great upscale atmosphere with the best bartenders in the 256! Owners and management are very friendly. Food is AWESOME. would highly recommend and would give 10 stars if it was a option!

resp.text: Wow… appreciate the valuable feedback. We have team of people from management to employees. They take care of each guest.

name: Larry Hardy
text: Great food and atmosphere definitely will go back. I recommend it to everyone. That have Indian and American food and both are amazing

resp.text: We look forward to your next visit to the Jokers serving both American and Indian cuisine. Our decor is very contemporary and unique. Thank you for your review.

name: Andy modi
text: Ordered Chicken Tikka 555 and it was an awesome experience. Joker reminded me of my good old days in India

resp.text: Wonderful! Chicken tikka 555 is a specialty dish created by our chef. It is a very popular dish. Pleased you enjoyed the Indian we have created with authentic Indian cuisine.

name: Brandy Massey
text: Something new & unique to the area with the Indian food! Good atmosphere & people that owns it! I do believe this business will last,and as a community we need to uplift these owners and employees so they will succeed! 😌😌

resp.text: Thank you for your support. Great food and ambiance. Yes we’re here to ensure we serve the community with delicious food with excellent service.

name: Tyler Foreman
text:
Both voodoo, and joker burgers are fantastic.
Fish & chips are bomb af.
Lamb Curry is everything.
Glad this place came to the shoals to bring some variety to the area.

resp.text: Wow wonderful you enjoyed variety of cuisine both American and Indian. Our burgers are specifically formulated for our restaurant. Fish and chip a great British tradition made fresh cod. Great with splash of malt vinegar. All our curries of great taste mainly chicken, lamb, fish or vegetables. Thank you for your business and hope to see soon.

name: Pace Forrest
text: Waitress was very nice and kept us taken care of. Food was well cooked and the building itself looks very nice.

resp.text: We have the finest team in the Shoals at Jokers. Our team are very friendly, polite and helpful with great service and food. Thank you for your business.

name: Garret Cox
text: Cool atmosphere, delicious food and drinks. On top of normal fare (burgers, etc) they have delicious indian cuisine! Try the chicken tikka masala and naan bread!

resp.text: Fabulous! Yes you are right Chicken Tikka Masala is a very popular authentic Indian dish made with creamy gravy with various spices. Our naan bread is cooked freshly in tandoor ( clay oven)- you can have plain, butter, garlic/butter or chilly naan, choice is yours. Our signature burger is Jokers Burger specially created by our chef. We appreciate your business. Thank you.

name: Austin Lee
text: I cant leave a biased opinion on the establishment. The reason i am biased is i really dont have the liking for indian food. But they do have other options. Worth the try if u do like the food

resp.text: Yes you are correct we have 2 cuisines- American and Indian cuisine. The choice is yours. Thank you for your feedback.

name: John Chase
text: I rounded up my family and came here for lunch today based on this web page and the sign out front showing that they should be open.  The place looked closed, no cars, and no one answered the phone.  I was disappointed.  But,  the manager called me later to explain they were open but he was in the back and had no customers yet so they looked closed.  I will try again soon and try the door even if they look closed!

resp.text: We are open today 11am to 9pm. Everyday we are open Tuesday to Thursday 11am to 9pm, Friday and Saturday close at 10pm . Sundays 12pm-6pm. Closed on Mondays. These are restaurant times. Hope to see you at these opening times. Our management spoke to you earlier. Thank you.

name: Ryan Swindle
text: Very nice new restaurant in our area. Lots of variety on the menu.

resp.text: Absolutely newest restaurant in the Shoals area. We cater for all authentic Indian and American cuisine in a great atmosphere. Thank you for your patronage.

name: Michelle White
text: Affordable and delicious. One of the best burgers I've ever had.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Our burgers are the best in the Shoals. We have our signature Jokers Burger - very popular with our guests. Great food at affordable prices.

name: ALEX P
text:
Exceeds Expectation!

Meat and veggies freshness and quality guaranteed, ingredients and spices adequate quantity, superb menu instructions and result, tasty and satisfying, excellent and prompt customer service!!!

resp.text: Excellent five stars rating! We appreciate your business. We serve both American and Indian cuisine at highest quality and freshness. We have many  of dishes choices for every consumer palate. All our team members provide finest service in the restaurant/ bar industry.

name: Martin Dean
text: We have Indian food in the Shoals! WOOHOO! it was very good, the Samosas were divine, Chicken Curry, off the chain. Go, expand your horizons!

resp.text: Yes we’re are glad to bring Indian cuisine to the Shoals. Glad we made your choice of palate. We offer variety of dishes.

name: Jacob Hodgson
text: I can't attest to the atmosphere, but the Lamb Vindaloo that I just got for lunch take-out is worth the five stars on its own.

resp.text: Great. Pleased that you enjoyed your lamb vindaloo- obviously you enjoy hot spicy dish. You should try our popular dish of chicken tikka Masala. Thank you for your your take-out order.

name: Deanna Jackson
text: Amazing food great service. We have been there many tine

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely appreciate your continued support by frequently coming to our Jokers restaurant/bar. We certainly have amazing food and great selection on our menu.

name: Timothy James
text: Nice place.  Great food and friendly staff.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed your food and service at Jokers. We offer variety of American and Indian cuisine. Our staff are absolutely friendly and polite.

name: Allison Mackey
text: Went on a Friday night for dinner. We had cocktails, the vegetable samosas, veggie curry, chana masala (chickpeas), and gulab jamun. STELLAR food. Hopefully the service will improve (took a very very very long time to get our food.) Also looking forward to the full Indian menu availability. I appreciated that Indian music was playing as we ate. Super friendly staff. Will eat here again!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our Indian menu is very highly recommended by our valuable guests like yourself. We will be extending our menu in the near future. We apologize for delay in serving your meal. We cook fresh food, so it takes time to prepare and execute. Appreciate your business.

name: Terri Whalen
text: The food was awesome - veg samosas, chicken 555, shrimp pakora, saag paneer, chicken curry, - all excellent! Garlic nan was very flavorful.  The mixed drinks were exceptional.  The raita was a bit thin for my preference but had great flavor.  Rice was perfect. They are still working from a limited menu so looking forward to going back again to try some other dishes.  So happy to have Indian as a local option - it is one of our favorite cuisines and we always had to travel to get it.  (We did have a rather long wait time to get our food but I think that is reflective of a new venture...I’m sure they will work out the kinks with time.)  Definitely recommend for great Indian good.

resp.text: Fantastic 5 stars review. We offer variety of Indian cuisine. Pleased you enjoyed your dishes ordered. Thank you for your understanding of delay in food. Our naans are freshly made in tandoor. All our meals are made freshly, cooked to order. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

name: Timothy Whalen
text:
The food here is excellent. It's at least as good as any Indian food I've had in Nashville, Birmingham, or Huntsville. The chicken 555, vegetable samosas, and shrimp pelota we're tasty and well prepared. Saag Paneer, Chicken Curry, and Lamb Korma had delightful subtle flavors. The meats were succulent. Gulab Jamun was chewy on the outside creamy on the inside in a sweet but not cloying honey sauce.
The reason for only four stars is they are new so it took a long time for the food to come out, the servers didn't know the menu very well, and they seemed confused. Once they get their systems running more smoothly they'll be 5 starts for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for your visit to Jokers to try out our Indian cuisine. We serve variety of appetizers, entrees and desserts. Our meals are cooked fresh and takes time to delivery to your table. We look forward to your next visit.

name: Sonia Patek
text: Very friendly place. Love Indian food. Everything is extravaganza❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback. It was a pleasure serving you with authentic Indian cuisine. Pleased you enjoyed our friendly service, great atmosphere, delicious Indian food and ambiance.

name: Markesha Hackett
text: Go get you a Mother Clucker Chicken sandwich or fish and chips!!! Omg sooooo good!

resp.text: Yes it is gray choices of meals. Fish and Chips is very popular. Thank you for your feedback.

text: Service is slow and management seems indifferent. Alcohol was served to obviously patrons that were clearly to inebriated to drink more.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Our food is cooked fresh therefore may take slightly longer to deliver to your table. Very confusing about management comment, we get compliments on our management interaction with our valuable guests. Every individual has there own tolerance on consumption of alcohol, we do not control people’s habits!

resp.text: Wonderful. Thank you for your review. Glad you enjoyed your visit to our bar and restaurant. Check out our Facebook for live entertainment weekly.

name: Ron Almy
text: Although , not opened(opening is scheduled for March 15 )it'll contain a sports themed atmosphere, several bars and a family friendly restaurant with quality foods and an authentic        Indian style menu.

resp.text: We are open now with American and Indian restaurant with great cocktails, beer and music. Come and check us out.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Let us know on your next visit- suggestions on music of choice.

text: Finally, real Indian food in the Shoals. Tandoori Chicken was great. Margaritas were pretty good, but are the smallest I've seen.

resp.text: Great! Yes we are getting many new guests trying out Indian cuisine and others who have tried Indian food elsewhere before. Tandoor Chicken is cooked in a special Tandoor ( clay oven) with spices. This is a very popular appetizer dish. We have variety of beers including Kingfisher from India, domestic/ foreign and IPA beers, spirits, signature cocktails. Thank you for your patronage.

name: Cheyenne Soloman
text: My favorite club downtown. the drinks are cheap and strong. the music is good. and the staff is friendly.  I always have a great time while I am at Rush

name: Brad M (MackWillMadeIt)
text: May I get a list of rules for this club? One guy let me know last night that the rules were changing starting next week and I don't want any surprises like "oh it's no eyebrow night ,can't let you in with those". This club is one of the best downtown by far.

name: Melinda Johnson
text: I am one of the regulars at Club Rush and love the place.  If you are looking for a nice club to have some drinks and dance, this is the place to be.  Mickey and DonE always treat everyone like royalty and the music is awesome.  The staff is what makes this place rock.  Looking forward to bringing in 2010 at the best place in town!

text: Went on a Saturday night. Thought it was slow till someone showed my fiancé and me the upstairs. Had a blast. Nice mix of people and everyone was respectful. Definitely will be going back.

text: Be careful at this club they charge more on credit cards and don’t fix the problem. It's really funny I have been going to Club Rush for the last 6 months and every time I use my credit card they double the amount I owe on the bill. Or add to the bill without me knowing about it. I have tried to get them to fix this but NO response. It’s really sad I hate writing reviews but people have to know.

name: Jean Ann Canaday
text: Went to Rush Saturday night.  Really nice club.  Want to thank Ron J. for being so nice.

text: If you just want somewhere to be it works but it's like the hood of bars/clubs the drink are pretty sparse and served in plastic cups...Even the bar selection is lacking. The dj has quite a selection from nsync to I don't know what...pretty packed when I went so it would seem they are doing good for themselves...but I would not recommend it.

name: Tawanna stover
text: Hate It! They act like they have  a dress code but they don't it a skin color code and only allow red necks. its so sad but true. hate this place and will never go back

name: Dee Hem
text: This bar (not a club) is bias on its patrons. They, just like most of the establishments in the Huntsville Downtown district, are catered to a "certain" crowd. Weekly, the dress-code for access changes without any prior notification, mainly because this establishment has no clear guidelines of dress and make the judgements clearly on how they feel that morning. If you are in a group and you do not fit into their certain demographic regardless of dress in accordance, they will refuse service. Groups of certain people of a party over ten have to walk up to the doors in two people teams just to be allowed admittance, only to be followed the entire night. The barkeep would only allow one drink at a time (shot) versus other groups were allowed over several at one time.  It is unfair and it becomes an issue when this business is using business arbitrary rights to hide behind a discriminatory agenda. I will be reporting this business to the BBB.

name: LISA GRADY
text: this bar is a scam...the owner was supposed to be my friend and borrowed things from me and i am on disability...he was suppose to open 2 weeks ago..when i went to his house everything and i mean everything was cleaned out

We danced for a little bit and realized no one was having fun so I recommend somewhere else and paid for everyone to get it at the other place. We had so much fun at the other place and completely regret wasting our money here. Definitely will NOT be back. And will warn others to stay away.

text: Dope night spot with live music and the staff is really nice as well!!!

name: Alexys Willis
text: Went on a very slow night. But yet received very poor service. I doubt the bartender even knew how to make a Long Island from the amount of time she spent on her phone before actually making my drink. Then to add insult to injury my card was taken outside of the establishment and swiped somewhere else before being returned to me. The record on my bank statements says Lux yet my receipt was actually addressed to another location. No item was even listed just a big fat double charge for one drink. Unless you want to spend 22 dollars on a improper Long Island just save your money and go somewhere else. Definitely reporting them to the BBB. Oh also the owners were informed and decided to yell about it instead of fixing it. Trust me I may be from out of town but I definitely tell everyone I met STAY AWAY.

name: K Stylez
text: Everyone smokes inside and you smell terrible when you leave. Bartenders are slow and the regular dj needs to do better. How is this called Luxe but plays trap music all night.

text: Will never , ever go back to this pretend Luxe establishment with rickety broken tables, drinks with no garnishments or a promoter who has no idea what she is doing !!! Dont go here to see any artist!! They won't perform anywhere near a decent hour and they will only do 2 or 3 songs if that!! Save your money for a real venue!!

text: Very bad paid $70.00 for 2 tickets to see Lalah Hathaway, she song two songs and that was it after setting for 3 hrs for her to show. Looking like she had just stop by to see some friends after having gone to the store.  Not dress for a show, well I should understand, because she did not give one just showed up.  Would not go back or tell any friends.

name: Jocelyn L.
text: Attended a so-called Lalah Hathaway concert at this venue, paid $30 for my ticket.  Got there, people were looking upset and complaining about how late it was and the show had not started, at that time it was almost 10p.  Bar service was okay, drink was not that good.  Seating is weird, the stage set-up was so far away, everyone bunched up in certain sections.  Concert finally started close to midnight.  Lalah sang two songs and left the stage, really??  People started leaving, and so did I.  Ridiculous to pay that amount of money waiting and the end result was a complete waste of time!  Definitely disappointed and probably won't be back for any type of concert.
